up.title: ## üèÖ Level Up!
up.desc:
{mention} ({username}) has reached level **{level}**! Keep up your good work! üéâ
-# next level exp: {nextLevelXp}

reward.title: ## üèÖ Role Awarded
reward.desc:
{mention} get role **{role}** for reaching level **{level}**.
Keep up the good work! üéâ

set.title: XP Set
set.desc: Successfully set XP for **{username}**. Now their level is **{newLevel}** and XP is **{newXp}**.

add.title: XP Added
add.desc: Successfully added **{xp}** XP to **{username}**. Now their level is **{newLevel}** and XP is **{newXp}**.

set.title: Level Set
set.desc: Successfully set the level of **{username}**. Now their level is **{newLevel}**. XP has been reset to 0.

created.title: Profile Created
created.desc: You did not have a level profile, one has been created for you.

profile.title: Level Profile
profile.desc: **{username}**, you are at level **{level}** with a total of **{xp}** XP. **Current XP:** {xp}/{nextLevelXp}.

add.title: Level Added
add.desc: Successfully added **{level}** level(s) to **{username}**. Now their level is **{newLevel}**. XP has been reset to 0.
